EmailTemplate.name: 20183_FSEIntro_Mark2_LG.20183_FSEIntro_Mark_email
EmailTemplate.subject: Meet Your Field Service Engineer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> MEET YOUR FIELD SERVICE ENGINEER Hello, As your Honeywell customer support manager, I’m excited to introduce you to {{lead.FSE/Intiator name:default=Blank}}, who is your primary field service engineer. You can still take advantage of the 24/7 global technical support network, but as the FSE in your area, {{lead.FSE/Intiator First Name:default=Blank}} will be your go-to contact when available. We’re confident this will provide you with additional support where and when you need it. {{lead.FSE/Intiator First Name:default=Blank}} can be reached by phone at {{lead.FSE/Intiator Phone:default=Blank}}. In addition, we’ll be reaching out to you over the next few weeks to introduce you to him. As always, if for some reason he's unavailable, you can take advantage of the responsive 24/7 technical support network by contacting us through www.MyAerospace.Honeywell.com <[[http://www.myaerospace.honeywell.com/]]>, calling 1-855-808-6500 or e-mailing aerotechsupport@honeywell.com <[[mailto:aerotechsupport@honeywell.com]]>.
If you have questions, please contact me.
Honeywell Aerospace Customer & Product Support Visit MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/R00q00oI0G002000QQXh7Z0]]>
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/u/hq0pk0I00Q0000GnZ020XI0]]>
